html:
Hi Louis Barclay,

Youre in! Were writing to let you know that Ashley manually reviewed and approved your account and you can now start sending email from your app to any email address. As a reminder, your username is lgwb89. You can log into your account here.

Thanks for your patience during this process. We review every new account manually to make sure our platform is used only for transactional email. This helps us maintain the highest possible reliability and deliverability rates for all of our customers.

Now that youre part of the Postmark family, there are a few things you can expect from us:

  • First and foremost, you can expect your emails to be delivered quickly to your customers inboxes. That is why we exist, and well never lose sight of that.
  • You can also expect clear and accurate documentation, a straightforward UI, and helpful support from friendly humans who know what theyre talking about (and who want to see your business thrive as much as you do).

If you have any questions as you get set up, just reply and well do everything we can to help you along. Also be sure to check out our step-by-step guide on how to implement Postmark in the way thats best for your app.

Seriously, though  welcome. Were really happy youre with us.

The Postmark Team
Thanks again from the entire team at Wildbit,
the company behind Postmark.
